0101111101110101 0000001101011010 0 -> sum: 0110001011001111, cout: 0
1101011111000010 1100001010001010 0 -> sum: 1001101001001100, cout: 1
0101100001101000 1010011110101100 1 -> sum: 0000000000010101, cout: 1

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
